job.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
job.description:
NOTE: Any visa fine but PASSPORT Must.&nbsp;Immediate&nbsp;Openings Full Stack JAVA Developer for Portland, OR (Any visa fine)&nbsp; Hello, I Hope you are doing great. Please find the below Job Descriptions and revert me with a suitable resume.  Job Title: Full Stack JAVA Developer Location:&nbsp;Portland, OR Duration: ContractSkills:  - 7-10 years workable   
  - J2EE developer with reactJS, Node JS, Spring Boot, AWS, CSS ,Java Script, API   
  - Type Script   
  - Working experience on Lambda   
  - Must have debugging skills.   
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Thanks & Regards,Rajesh Kondu,Email: Rajesh@dvgts.com&nbsp;Direct: (609) 994-0617 Ext 126Phone : +91 9676168391DVG Tech Solutions LLC.
